internal.content:
---
title: Oracle Connector
---           

## Configuration before upgrade
- Stop transactions from Maximo to Oracle
- Process all transactions in the interface tables.
- Resolve any Oracle integration open/Error transaction in Maximo
- Disable the External System OA12
- Backup pl/sql user exits and any customization on EBS side.
- Stop the MX7612 Maximo server
- Backup Maximo 7612 db.

## Configuration after upgrade
- Define the Message provider and queues  (Kafka or JMS)
- Assign queues to External System OA12
- Configure KAFKA Cron task (If using Kafka, update the settings according to MIF guide)
- Disable JMSQSEQCONSUMER Cron task (If using Kafka)
- Recreate interface tables and pl/sql objects in Oracle EBS 12.x MAXORA schema ( this we did not do)
- Reapply customization's on pl/sql side.
- Enable external system

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: Oracle Connector
---           

## Configuration before upgrade
- Stop transactions from Maximo to Oracle
- Process all transactions in the interface tables.
- Resolve any Oracle integration open/Error transaction in Maximo
- Disable the External System OA12
- Backup pl/sql user exits and any customization on EBS side.
- Stop the MX7612 Maximo server
- Backup Maximo 7612 db.

## Configuration after upgrade
- Define the Message provider and queues  (Kafka or JMS)
- Assign queues to External System OA12
- Configure KAFKA Cron task (If using Kafka, update the settings according to MIF guide)
- Disable JMSQSEQCONSUMER Cron task (If using Kafka)
- Recreate interface tables and pl/sql objects in Oracle EBS 12.x MAXORA schema ( this we did not do)
- Reapply customization's on pl/sql side.
- Enable external system
